zhao-etal-2022-polarity.title: From Polarity to Intensity: Mining Morality from Semantic Space
zhao-etal-2022-polarity.author: Zhao, Chunxu  and Liu, Pengyuan  and Yu, Dong
zhao-etal-2022-polarity.paperMotivationText: Current models of moral values only measure  discrete polarity but fail to provide information on degree or intensity of moral judgments.
zhao-etal-2022-polarity.paperContributionText: MORALSCORE , a weakly-supervised framework that can automatically measure moral intensity from text.
zhao-etal-2022-polarity.paperResultsText: Good performance for measuring moral intensity for both automatic and human evaluation
